TopicTitle: GameFront is closing, lets save the mods

Articles.Content:
Quote

After 20 years of service, it is sad to see GameFront will be ceasing operations in 2 weeks on April 30th. We must unite as a community and preserve the mods that GameFront hosts which might otherwise be lost forever.

 

http://www.moddb.com/groups/moddb/news/gamefront-is-closing-lets-save-the-mods#readarticle

So, if you have in gamefront, mods, move them somewhere else if you want.
Modding issue moved to the modding subforum.

TIL that there's a thing called "GameFront" that I'd never heard of before.

So I went there and searched for kerbal, and found it did have a page for Kerbal Space Program.

Then I told it to list which mods it has for it.

And the list was empty.

Exactly which mods are you talking about trying to save?  Are there some that didn't show up in my search?

Edited April 17, 2016 by Steven Mading
